quote_first: Good, you said. Run, or you won't get a seat. See you soon. Your voice was reassuring.
quote_last: :00, the clock said. I put the phone back on its hook and I ran. The seat I got, almost the last one in the carriage, was opposite a girl who started coughing as soon as there weren't any other free seats I could move to. She looked pale and the cough rattled deep in her chest as she punched numbers into her mobile. Hi, she said (cough). I'm on the train. No, I've got a cold. A cold (cough). Yeah, really bad. Yeah, awful actually. Hello? (cough) Hello?
title: The Whole Story and Other Stories
author: Ali Smith
